title: About Me
description:
As a CS graduate from Trento, I build cutting-edge software that rejects inefficiency. I avoid repetitive patterns to focus on high-value projects, from secure smart contracts to innovative web tools. My goal is to create "state-of-the-art" code that is purposeful, clean, and impactful.

Inspired by my thesis in Game Design, I bridge the gap between engineering and aesthetics. I enjoy using CSS for artistic expression ensuring that robust logic always meets a polished, engaging user experience.

title: Blockchain
description: I specialize in Solidity, building secure and gas-optimized smart contract architectures. I focus on modular systems that function like on-chain microservices, prioritizing trustless logic and transparent, flawless execution to solve complex problems within the EVM ecosystem.

title: Coding
description: Coding is my blend of engineering and artistry. I am obsessed with clean, modular logic and the subtle details that turn a functional tool into a polished experience. Focusing on Solidity and JavaScript, I strive for technical elegance—where robust architecture meets creative, seamless design.

title: Design
description: I specialize in interactive prototyping and spatial composition. Using Figma, I build high-fidelity, logic-driven prototypes that prioritize seamless user flows. My approach to 3D focuses on structural arrangement and scene composition, while my UI style remains clean and minimalist, ensuring harmony through simplicity and functional clarity.

title: Gaming
description: Gaming is my playground for optimization and analytical thinking. I don’t just play; I deconstruct mechanics, analyze damage systems, and build tools to maximize efficiency—from custom bots to viral ROI calculators. This passion for balance and system logic culminated in my thesis, where I designed and fine-tuned complex game mechanics for optimal player experiences.
